verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> be-re-Shit, In the beginning מַמְלְכ֛וּת <WH4468> mam-le-Chut of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֥ים <WH3079> ye-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> yo-shi-Ya-hu of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah הָיָה֙ <WH1961> ha-Yah came הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> had-da-Var came this word הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

כֹּ֣ה׀ <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עֲמֹד֮ <WH5975> 'a-Mod Stand בַּחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> ba-cha-Tzar in the court בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- house יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD'S וְדִבַּרְתָּ֞ <WH1696> ve-dib-bar-Ta and speak עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei unto all the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah הַבָּאִים֙ <WH935> hab-ba-'Im which come לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <WH7812> le-hish-ta-cha-Vot to worship בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, in the LORD'S אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim, all the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher i צִוִּיתִ֖יךָ <WH6680> tziv-vi-Ti-cha that I command לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> le-dab-Ber thee to speak אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem; about אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּגְרַ֖ע <WH1639> tig-Ra' unto them diminish דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> da-Var. not a word

אוּלַ֣י <WH194> 'u-Lai Perhaps יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> yish-me-'U, If so be they will hearken וְיָשֻׁ֕בוּ <WH7725> ve-ya-Shu-vu and turn אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> mid-dar-Ko way הָרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah; from his evil וְנִחַמְתִּ֣י <WH5162> ve-ni-cham-Ti that I may repent אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- from הָרָעָ֗ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah, me of the evil אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I חֹשֵׁב֙ <WH2803> cho-Shev which I purpose לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to do לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei unto them because רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> Ro-a' of the evil מַעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> ma-'al-lei-Hem. of their doings

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta And thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo you will not תִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> tish-me-'U If ye will not hearken אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> la-Le-chet walk בְּת֣וֹרָתִ֔י <WH8451> be-To-ra-Ti, in my law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti which I have set לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> lif-nei-Chem. before

לִשְׁמֹ֗עַ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a', To hearken עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto דִּבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> div-Rei to the words עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai of my servants הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im, the prophets אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <WH7971> sho-Le-ach whom I sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem; to you וְהַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> ve-hash-Kem unto you both rising up early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <WH7971> ve-sha-Lo-ach and sending וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH8085> she-ma'-Tem. [them] but ye have not hearkened

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti Then will I make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit this house הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this כְּשִׁלֹ֑ה <WH7887> ke-shi-Loh; like Shiloh וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir this city; הַזֹּאתָה haz-zo-tah כהַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> haz-zoT likewise קאֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten and will make לִקְלָלָ֔ה <WH7045> lik-la-Lah, a curse לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> le-Chol to all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> go-Yei to all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the earth ס sa-Mek

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֛וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U heard הַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim So the priests וְהַנְּבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> ve-han-ne-vi-'Im and the prophets וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; and all the people אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu, Jeremiah מְדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> me-dab-Ber speaking אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> vay-Hi become כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> ke-chal-Lot had made an end יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu, Now it came to pass when Jeremiah לְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> le-dab-Ber of speaking אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, all that the LORD לְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> le-dab-Ber [him] to speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; unto all the people וַיִּתְפְּשׂ֨וּ <WH8610> vai-yit-pe-Su took אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> o-To הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim that the priests וְהַנְּבִאִ֛ים <WH5030> ve-han-ne-vi-'Im and the prophets וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> le-Mor him saying מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot Thou shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> ta-Mut. die

מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> mad-du-a' Why נִבֵּ֨יתָ <WH5012> nib-Bei-ta Why hast thou prophesied בְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> ve-shem- in the name יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying כְּשִׁלוֹ֙ <WH7887> ke-shi-Lo shall be like Shiloh יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> yih-Yeh become הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit This house הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, This וְהָעִ֥יר <WH5892> ve-ha-'Ir and this city הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise תֶּחֱרַ֖ב <WH2717> te-che-Rav shall be desolate מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> me-'Ein without יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> yo-Shev; without an inhabitant וַיִּקָּהֵ֧ל <WH6950> vai-yik-ka-Hel were gathered כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ha-'Am ;And all the people אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- about יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu against Jeremiah בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ׀ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U heard שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei When the princes יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu then they came up מִבֵּית־ <WH1004> mib-beit- house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech from the king's בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit unto the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <WH3427> vai-ye-she-Vu and sat down בְּפֶ֥תַח <WH6607> be-Fe-tach in the entry שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> sha-'ar- gate יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD'S הֶחָדָֽשׁ׃ <WH2319> he-cha-Dash. of the new ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru Then spake הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim the priests וְהַנְּבִאִים֙ <WH5030> ve-han-ne-vi-'Im and the prophets אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> has-sa-Rim, unto the princes וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and to all the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> mish-pat- [is] worthy מָ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> ma-vet to die לָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> la-'Ish This man הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for נִבָּא֙ <WH5012> nib-Ba for he hath prophesied אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir against this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher you שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> she-ma'-Tem as ye have heard בְּאָזְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH241> be-'a-ze-nei-Chem. with your ears

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then spake יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- to all הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> has-sa-Rim, unto all the princes וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and to all the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD שְׁלָחַ֗נִי <WH7971> she-la-Cha-ni, sent לְהִנָּבֵ֞א <WH5012> le-hin-na-Ve me to prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- and against הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit against this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh this וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and against הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir and against this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim all the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH8085> she-ma'-Tem. that ye have heard

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now הֵיטִ֤יבוּ <WH3190> hei-Ti-vu Therefore now amend דַרְכֵיכֶם֙ <WH1870> dar-chei-Chem your ways וּמַ֣עַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4611> u-Ma-'al-lei-Chem, and your doings וְשִׁמְע֕וּ <WH8085> ve-shim-'U and obey בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God וְיִנָּחֵ֣ם <WH5162> ve-yin-na-Chem will repent יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, and the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah, him of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> dib-Ber that he hath pronounced עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem. against

וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> hin-Ni I am in בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> ve-yed-Chem; As for me behold I [am] in your hand עֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> 'a-su- do לִ֛י li כַּטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> kat-Tov good וְכַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> ve-chai-ya-Shar and meet בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> be-'ei-nei-Chem. with me as seemeth

אַ֣ךְ׀ <WH389> 'ach Only יָדֹ֣עַ <WH3045> ya-Do-a' But know תֵּדְע֗וּ <WH3045> te-de-'U, ye for certain כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki that אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if מְמִתִ֣ים <WH4191> me-mi-Tim that if ye put me to death אַתֶּם֮ <WH859> 'at-Tem you אֹתִי֒ <WH853> 'o-Ti כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for דָ֣ם <WH1818> dam blood נָקִ֗י <WH5355> na-Ki, innocent אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> 'at-Tem you נֹתְנִ֣ים <WH5414> no-te-Nim ye shall surely bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem, and וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir upon yourselves and upon this city הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and on יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> yo-she-Vei-ha; and upon the inhabitants כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for בֶאֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> ve-'e-Met, thereof for of a truth שְׁלָחַ֤נִי <WH7971> she-la-Cha-ni hath sent יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem, to you לְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> le-dab-Ber me unto you to speak בְּאָזְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH241> be-'a-ze-nei-Chem, in your ears אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these ס sa-Mek
